existing_features.title: Add the uploaded image file (MR icon-1.png) to the frontend public static assets and use it as the primary brand logo in the site header and footer, replacing the current logo asset reference.
Update the site favicon configuration to use the uploaded image file (MR icon-1.png) instead of the current favicon asset, ensuring the href is correctly URL-encoded where necessary.

new_feature_requests.summary: Use the provided asset as the app/site logo or icon

projectName: Use uploaded MR icon as site logo and favicon
